EXIT.NAME: false
EXIT.FAILURE-MESSAGE: Content retrieve failed as $source does not exist or is unreachable: %$source.directory%

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: restore the file to original location and name

INVOKE.COMMENT: restore to original location and name

Values.value: %$message%; 1 file skipped possibly due to locking by another process, or the retrieve process having insufficient access rights
%$message%; %$skipped% files skipped possibly due to locking by another process, or the retrieve process having insufficient access rights
